name: u-blox AG
legal: Corporation listed at Swiss stock exchange
goal: We develop reliable and innovative positioning and wireless communication solutions that securely connect vehicles, industries, things, and millions of people around the world.
interests: Business and Industry, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives:
- 3GPP (ETSI is partner SDO) RAN WG1, WG2, WG3 and WG4; High Accuracy Positioning Work Item for LTE and NR for Releases 15 and 16
- ETSI ITS, WG1, EN 302890-2
- EC DGMOVE, GNSS - Smart Tachograph
- SES SCN, GNSS test standard EN 303 413
- ERM: EG 203 336 & EMC test standard 301 489-19
